price: 18. Waxaa dhab ahaan beeniyey (Xaqa) kuwii ka horreeyey, ee sidee buu ahaa Ciqaabkeygii?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
